009package imagingbook.common.regions;
010
011import java.awt.Rectangle;
012import java.util.Iterator;
013import java.util.LinkedList;
014import java.util.List;
015import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
016
017import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
018import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d.PntInt;
019
020/**
021 * Defines a binary region that is backed by the label array of a region
022 * segmentation. A {@link SegmentationBackedRegion} instance does not have its
023 * own list or array of contained pixel coordinates but refers to the label
024 * array of the associated {@link BinaryRegionSegmentation} instance.
025 */
026public class SegmentationBackedRegion extends BinaryRegion {
027
028        private final int label;                                                                        // the label of this region
029        private final BinaryRegionSegmentation segmentation;            // the segmentation backing this region
030        
031        private int size = 0;
032        private int left = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
033        private int right = -1;
034        private int top = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
035        private int bottom = -1;
036
037        private Contour outerContour = null;
038        private List<Contour> innerContours = null;
039
040        // summation variables used for various statistics
041        private long x1Sum = 0;
042        private long y1Sum = 0;
043        private long x2Sum = 0;
044        private long y2Sum = 0;
045        private long xySum = 0;
046
047        // ------- constructor --------------------------
048
049        /**
050         * Constructor.
051         * @param label the label (number) assigned to this region
052         * @param seg the backing region segmentation
053         */
054        SegmentationBackedRegion(int label, BinaryRegionSegmentation seg) {
055                this.label = label;
056                this.segmentation = seg;
057        }
058
059        // ------- public methods --------------------------
060
061        /**
062         * Returns the label (number) of this region.
063         * @return the region label
064         */
065        public int getLabel() {
066                return this.label;
067        }
068
069        @Override
070        public int getSize() {
071                return this.size;
072        }
073        
074        @Override
075        public long getX1Sum() {
076                return x1Sum;
077        }
078
079        @Override
080        public long getY1Sum() {
081                return y1Sum;
082        }
083
084        @Override
085        public long getX2Sum() {
086                return x2Sum;
087        }
088
089        @Override
090        public long getY2Sum() {
091                return y2Sum;
092        }
093
094        @Override
095        public long getXYSum() {
096                return xySum;
097        }
098
099        @Override
100        public Rectangle getBoundingBox() {
101                if (right < 0)
102                        return null;
103                else
104                        return new Rectangle(left, top, right-left + 1, bottom - top + 1);
105        }
106
107        @Override
108        public Iterator<Pnt2d> iterator() {
109                return new RegionPixelIterator();
110        }
111
112        /**
113         * Adds a single pixel to this region and updates summation
114         * and boundary variables used to calculate various region statistics.
115         * 
116         * @param u x-position
117         * @param v y-position
118         */
119        void addPixel(int u, int v) {
120                size = size + 1;
121                x1Sum = x1Sum + u;
122                y1Sum = y1Sum + v;
123                x2Sum = x2Sum + u * u;
124                y2Sum = y2Sum + v * v;
125                xySum = xySum + u * v;
126                if (u < left)   left = u;
127                if (v < top)    top = v;
128                if (u > right)  right = u;
129                if (v > bottom) bottom = v;
130        }
131
132        /**
133         * Updates the region's statistics. 
134         * Does nothing but may be overridden by inheriting classes.
135         */
136        void update() {
137        }
138
139        @Override
140        public Contour getOuterContour() {      // TODO: invoke some contour tracer if contour not available?
141                return outerContour;
142        }
143
144        @Override
145        void setOuterContour(Contour.Outer contr) {
146                outerContour = contr;
147        }
148
149        @Override
150        public List<Contour> getInnerContours() {
151//              return (innerContours != null) ? innerContours : Collections.emptyList();
152                return innerContours;
153        }
154
155        void addInnerContour(Contour.Inner contr) {
156                if (innerContours == null) {
157                        innerContours = new LinkedList<>();
158                }
159                innerContours.add(contr);
160        }
161
162        /**
163         * Checks if the given pixel position is contained in this
164         * {@link SegmentationBackedRegion} instance.
165         * @param u x-coordinate
166         * @param v y-coordinate
167         * @return true if (u,v) is contained in this region
168         */
169        @Override
170        public boolean contains(int u, int v) {
171                return segmentation.getLabel(u, v) == this.label;
172        }
173        
174        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
175
176        /**
177         * Instances of this class are returned by {@link SegmentationBackedRegion#iterator()},
178         * which implements  {@link Iterable} for instances of class {@link Pnt2d}.
179         */
180        private class RegionPixelIterator implements Iterator<Pnt2d> {
181                private final int label;                                        // the corresponding region's label
182                private final int uMin, uMax, vMin, vMax;       // coordinates of region's bounding box
183                private int uCur, vCur;                                         // current pixel position
184                private PntInt pNext;                                           // coordinates of the next region pixel
185                private boolean first;                                          // control flag
186
187                RegionPixelIterator() {
188                        label = SegmentationBackedRegion.this.getLabel();
189                        Rectangle bb = SegmentationBackedRegion.this.getBoundingBox();
190                        first = true;
191                        uMin = bb.x;
192                        uMax = bb.x + bb.width;
193                        vMin = bb.y;
194                        vMax = bb.y + bb.height;
195                        uCur = uMin;
196                        vCur = vMin;
197                        pNext = null;
198                }
199
200                /** 
201                 * Search from position (uCur, vCur) for the next valid region pixel.
202                 * Return the next position as a Point or null if no such point can be found.
203                 * Don't assume that (uCur, vCur) is a valid region pixel!
204                 * 
205                 * @return the next point
206                 */
207                private Pnt2d.PntInt findNext() {
208                        // start search for next region pixel at (u,v):
209                        int u = (first) ? uCur : uCur + 1;
210                        int v = vCur;
211                        first = false;
212                        while (v <= vMax) {
213                                while (u <= uMax) {
214                                        if (segmentation.getLabel(u, v) == label) { // next pixel found (uses surrounding labeling)
215                                                uCur = u;
216                                                vCur = v;
217                                                return PntInt.from(uCur, vCur);
218                                        }
219                                        u++;
220                                }
221                                v++;
222                                u = uMin;
223                        }
224                        uCur = uMax + 1;        // just to make sure we'll never enter the loop again
225                        vCur = vMax + 1;
226                        return null;            // no next pixel found
227                }
228
229                @Override
230                public boolean hasNext() {
231                        if (pNext != null) {    // next element has been queried before but not consumed
232                                return true;
233                        }
234                        else {
235                                pNext = findNext();     // keep next pixel coordinates in pNext
236                                return (pNext != null);
237                        }
238                }
239
240                // Returns: the next element in the iteration
241                // Throws: NoSuchElementException - if the iteration has no more elements.
242                @Override
243                public PntInt next() {
244                        if (pNext != null || hasNext()) {
245                                PntInt pn = pNext;
246                                pNext = null;           // "consume" pNext
247                                return pn;
248                        }
249                        else {
250                                throw new NoSuchElementException();
251                        }
252                }
253
254                @Override
255                public void remove() {
256                        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
257                }
258
259        } // end of class RegionPixelIterator
260
261} // end of class BinaryRegion
